title: The Iron Spoon of Liberation
data:

**The Iron Spoon of Liberation** is an [artifact](/wiki/Artifact_weapon "Artifact weapon") [weapon-tool](/wiki/Weapon-tool "Weapon-tool") in [dNetHack](/wiki/DNetHack "DNetHack"). It is the [quest artifact](/wiki/Quest_artifact "Quest artifact") for [Convicts](/wiki/Convict "Convict"), and acts as the prize for completing the [Convict quest](/wiki/Convict_quest "Convict quest"); it replaces [The Iron Ball of Liberation](/wiki/The_Iron_Ball_of_Liberation "The Iron Ball of Liberation"), which is now called [The Iron Ball of Levitation](/index.php?title=The_Iron_Ball_of_Levitation\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "The Iron Ball of Levitation (page does not exist)") and given to you by your [quest leader](/wiki/Quest_leader "Quest leader"), [Robert the Lifer](/wiki/Robert_the_Lifer "Robert the Lifer"), upon accepting the quest. It is chaotic for wishing purposes, and its base item is a [spoon](/wiki/Spoon "Spoon").

## Effects

The Iron Spoon of Liberation has a +1d5 to-hit bonus and does double damage to all monsters. When carried, it confers [automatic searching](/wiki/Automatic_searching "Automatic searching"), [free action](/wiki/Free_action "Free action"), and acts as a [luckstone](/wiki/Luckstone "Luckstone"), in addition to providing a bonus to manual [searching](/wiki/Searching "Searching"); when wielded, it confers [stealth](/wiki/Stealth "Stealth"). [Invoking](/wiki/Invoking "Invoking") the Iron Spoon allows you to [phase](/wiki/Phase "Phase") through walls for a limited time, much like The Iron Ball of Liberation. [Applying](/wiki/Apply "Apply") The Iron Spoon of Liberation allows you to [dig](/wiki/Dig "Dig"); it can also be used to [engrave](/wiki/Engrave "Engrave") with the same quality and speed as an [athame](/wiki/Athame "Athame").

As a spoon, Convicts wielding it can make [sneak attacks](/wiki/Sneak_attacks "Sneak attacks") similar to a [Rogue](/wiki/Rogue "Rogue").

- *This page is a **[stub](/wiki/Category:Stubs "Category:Stubs")**. Should you wish to do so, you can contribute by [**expanding this page**.](https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=The_Iron_Spoon_of_Liberation\&action=edit)*

[![This article describes a 3.4.3-based variant of NetHack. Click here for more information.](/images/5/5d/Nh343var-icon.png)](/wiki/NetHackWiki:Next_version "This article describes a 3.4.3-based variant of NetHack. Click here for more information.")
html:
The Iron Spoon of Liberation

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search
)   The Iron Spoon of Liberation   (No tile)
Base item spoon
Damage vs. small 1d2 ×2
Damage vs. large 1d2 ×2
To-hit bonus +1d5
Bonus versus (any)
Weapon skill knife
Size one-handed
Affiliation
  • chaotic
  • Convict
  • intelligent
When carried
  • automatic searching
  • free action
  • acts as luckstone
When wielded
  • stealth
When invoked
  • phasing
Base price 1 zm
Weight 1
Material iron

The Iron Spoon of Liberation is an artifact weapon-tool in dNetHack. It is the quest artifact for Convicts, and acts as the prize for completing the Convict quest; it replaces The Iron Ball of Liberation, which is now called The Iron Ball of Levitation and given to you by your quest leader, Robert the Lifer, upon accepting the quest. It is chaotic for wishing purposes, and its base item is a spoon.

Effects

The Iron Spoon of Liberation has a +1d5 to-hit bonus and does double damage to all monsters. When carried, it confers automatic searching, free action, and acts as a luckstone, in addition to providing a bonus to manual searching; when wielded, it confers stealth. Invoking the Iron Spoon allows you to phase through walls for a limited time, much like The Iron Ball of Liberation. Applying The Iron Spoon of Liberation allows you to dig; it can also be used to engrave with the same quality and speed as an athame.

As a spoon, Convicts wielding it can make sneak attacks similar to a Rogue.

This page is a stub. Should you wish to do so, you can contribute by expanding this page.
